ch.unige.ng.timer.conditions
Class StableFitnessCondition

java.lang.Object
  ch.unige.ng.timer.conditions.StableFitnessCondition
All Implemented Interfaces:
Condition
public class StableFitnessCondition
extends java.lang.Object
implements Condition

Test a fitness stagnation. The evolution will be terminated when the fitness does not change during a number of iteration defined. This class does not make sense when used with undeterministic fitness.

Version:
May 30, 2005 - 2:48:00 PM
Author:
Jean-Luc Falcone
